# load libraries 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(mgcv)
library(xgboost)
library(missForest)
library(doParallel)
registerDoParallel(cores=16)
```


```{r}
a2_data <- read_csv("../Starter/gss_clean.csv") %>% select(-c(caseid, main_activity)) %>% as.data.frame()  # just drop the NA's for now 
a2_data[sapply(a2_data, is.character)] <- lapply(a2_data[sapply(a2_data, is.character)], 
                                       as.factor)
glimpse(a2_data)
a2_data_imputed <- missForest(a2_data, maxiter = 15, ntree = 100, verbose = T, variablewise = TRUE)
a2_data_imputed_df <- a2_data_imputed$ximp
a2_data_imputed_error <- a2_data_imputed$OOBerror
write_csv(a2_data_imputed_df, "a2_data_imputed.csv")
```
